Comments_List: Higher level understanding of various subjects in systematics/phylogenetics

I learned a lot about the side of systematics that isn't so molecular based. How to interpret that information, particularly when data from multiple sources is in conflict. Limits to our current methods.
The discussion was stimulating and it was great to talk with people who approach systematics in a different way. The class met inconsistently though.
If interested in the minutiae of the topic, and not looking for a highly structured class, maybe
Yes, it was great to spitball ideas and discussion problems in systematics for a few hours each week.
